overview: Everybody has a fantasy. Maybe it's a backdoor urge. Maybe it's a hidden desire to take a woman between the breasts. Perhaps you've always wanted to share your lady. Or watch her squirt like Fallon. Well, we share those fantasies. All of them. And now we're sharing them with you on DVD. Fantasy in Blue. Think of it as five incredible dream sequences. Only you're wide awake to enjoy them.
title: Fantasy In Blue
